content.en: Android malware detection: Researchers have been exploring the use of deep learning techniques, such as convolutional neural networks and deep artificial neural networks, to improve the detection and identification of Android malware. These algorithms are being used to develop more efficient and accurate systems for automating the detection and classification of malware. Additionally, hybrid models and hyper-tuned approaches that combine different machine learning algorithms are being proposed to further enhance the detection accuracy of Android malware.
content.da: Android malware-detektion: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af dybe læringsteknikker, såsom konvolutionsneuronale netværk og dybe kunstige neurale netværk, for at forbedre detektionen og identifikationen af Android malware. Disse algoritmer anvendes til at udvikle mere effektive og præcise systemer til at automatisere detektionen og klassifikationen af malware. Derudover foreslås hybride modeller og hyper-tunede tilgange, der kombinerer forskellige maskinlæringsalgoritmer, for yderligere at forbedre nøjagtigheden af detektionen af Android malware.
